name: Sinos de Areia
description:
A história através da poeira e do vento. Nesse jogo você controla o vento, e o seu objetivo é reconstruir a abandonada cidade de Fatehpur Sikri enquanto relembra a sua história.

Controles:

W A S D ou ↑ ← → ↓ = Movimentação do jogador e dos botões nos menus.

Barra de espaço = Ganha velocidade e Seleciona opção nos menus.

Shift = Diminui sua velocidade do jogador.

Enter = Seleciona opção nos menus.

Esc = Pausa/Despausa o jogo.

English Instructions:

Hello! We didnt have time to translate the game to english, so all the game is in Brazilian Portuguese. Here are some Instructions and a little synopsis of the game!

The history through wind and dust. In this game you play as the wind, and your objective is to rebuild the forgotten city of Fatehpur Sikri while you remmember it's history.

In the menu you have the options: Jogar (will start the game), Opções (opens the option menu) and Sair (exit the game). In the options menu you have Volume (a slider that will change the volume of the game Vertical: Normal (Its the control scheme of the W and S buttons, clickin it will make the buttons inverted (Chanding Normal to Invertido)) Horizontal: Normal (Same as Vertical: Normal but for the A and D buttons) and Voltar (will bring you back to the menu).

While in game if you press the pause button you whill have acess to the options Menu (will end the game and throw you back to the main menu), Opções (same as the Options in the main menu) and Sair (will close the game).

Controls:

W A S D ou ↑ ← → ↓ = Controls the Player and the menus.

Barra de espaço = Gain Speed and selects an option in the menus.

Shift = Slow down the player.

Enter = Selects an option in the menus.

Esc = Pauses/Unpauses the Game.
